attributes.action: Resign rishi sunak and hold a public election
attributes.additional_details: We want the government to hold a meeting in the house of commons to discuss an election for a new prime minister.
attributes.background: We want rishi sunak to be resigned as his governmental descions have not been relevant to any current issues in the world.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked, but we have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Call an immediate general election: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/641904
